t: Build a medical imaging AI inference pipeline with MONAI Deploy on AWS | AWS Machine Learning Blog

t: Annotate DICOM images and build an ML model using the MONAI framework on Amazon SageMaker | AWS Machine Learning Blog
s: August 11, 2022 - DICOM (Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine) is an image format that contains visualizations of X-Rays and MRIs as well as any associated metadata. DICOM is the standard for medical professionals and healthcare researchers for visualizing and interpreting X-Rays and MRIs.
